headline.main: BRITISH POLICIES ON TRADE ARGUED; Foreign Trade Convention Hears Preference System Attacked and Defended

lead_paragraph: Conflicting views of the won trade policy of the British Empire were expressed at an "American British Commonwealth Luncheon" that was a feature of the closing session of the National Foreign Trade Convention at the Hotel Pennsylvania yesterday.
abstract: S on Brit trade policies, Natl Foreign Trade Conv
snippet: Conflicting views of the won trade policy of the British Empire were expressed at an "American British Commonwealth Luncheon" that was a feature of the closing session of the National Foreign Trade Convention at the Hotel Pennsylvania yesterday....
